member.name: T:WaveEngine.OpenVR.Helpers.NativeLibraries
member.summary: This static class is used to load the native libraries.

member.name: M:WaveEngine.OpenVR.Helpers.NativeLibraries.LoadNativeLibrary(System.String)
member.summary: Load a native library embedded in the current assembly.

members.member: Finds the active installation of vrclient.dll and initializes it
unloads vrclient.dll. Any interface pointers from the interface are invalid after this point
